title: Instagram is bad for teens’ self-esteem, and it knows it
description:
New reporting from the Wall Street Journal confirms what many teens already knew: Instagram can be harmful to their body image and self-esteem. And as it turns out, the company knows it too. Recode Media’s Peter Kafka (@pkafka) asked Adam Mosseri, the head of Instagram, about these revelations. 

References: 

Listen to Peter’s full interview with Adam Mosseri here


Read the Wall Street Journal’s reporting here
